summary: This document is an internal Bureau of Prisons email chain regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status. The initial email on July 30, 2019, states Epstein is being taken off Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate. The subsequent pages show a distribution list and read receipts for this message, dated August 13-14, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate (#76318-054) who is the subject of the email regarding his removal from Psych Observation and need for cellmate assignment.

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psych Observation
events.description: An internal Bureau of Prisons email states that inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.

keyFacts: On July 30, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was officially taken off Psych Observation status while in federal custody.
The email directive states he needed to be housed with an 'appropriate cellmate' following his removal from observation.
The document shows this status update was distributed to a large internal list (71 recipients) within the Bureau of Prisons.
The email chain and its read receipts span dates from July 30, 2019, to August 14, 2019, the period immediately preceding Epstein's death.
